## Imports

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(cranlogs)

library(dygraphs)
```

## Visualization Example

```{r}
downloads <- cran_downloads(packages = c("dplyr", "ggplot2"), from = "2017-01-01")
head(downloads)
ggplot(downloads, aes(x = date, y = count, color = package)) + geom_line()
```

## Using Other Plotting Libraries

### Dygraphs

```{r}
dygraph(downloads %>% filter(package == "dplyr") %>% select(-package), "Dplyr vs Ggplot2 Downloads")
```
